name: @social-freedom/infrastructure
description: Open-source social networking framework where each user account owns their infrastructure

scripts.federalstackcheck: npm run build && cdk -v -a "ts-node src/federal/app.ts" list
scripts.federalstackdeploy: npm run build && cdk -v -a "ts-node src/federal/app.ts" deploy
scripts.userstackcheck: npm run build && cdk -v -a "ts-node src/user/app.ts" list
scripts.userstackdeploy: npm run build && cdk -v -a "ts-node src/user/app.ts" deploy

author: Wayne Heaney
